actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.
Reported to House from the Committee on the Judiciary, H. Rept. 93-1021.

official_title: A bill to provide a rule in cases of the "pocket veto" for the implementation of section 7 of article I of the Constitution of the United States.

summary.text: Provides that the return of a bill, order, resolution, or vote under section 7 of article I of the constitution of the United States is prevented only when the adjournment of the Congress, or of either House, is sine die.

titles.title: A bill to provide a rule in cases of the "pocket veto" for the implementation of section 7 of article I of the Constitution of the United States.
